option_automaticMode_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_automaticMode_description)
option_automaticMode_description.message: Enable/disable use of your custom gateway as appropriate when IPFS API availability changes.

option_automaticMode_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_automaticMode_title)

option_catchUnhandledProtocols_descripti.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_catchUnhandledProtocols_description)
option_catchUnhandledProtocols_descripti.message: Enable provisional support for ipfs://, ipns://, and dweb: requests by redirecting them to an HTTP gateway.

option_catchUnhandledProtocols_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_catchUnhandledProtocols_title)

option_customGatewayUrl_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_customGatewayUrl_description)
option_customGatewayUrl_description.message: Set the URL of your preferred custom local gateway.

option_customGatewayUrl_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_customGatewayUrl_title)

option_customGatewayUrl_warning.description: A warning on the Preferences screen, displayed when URL does not belong to Secure Context (option_customGatewayUrl_warning)
option_customGatewayUrl_warning.message: IPFS content will be blocked from loading on HTTPS websites unless your gateway URL starts with “http://127.0.0.1”, “http://[::1]” or “https://”

option_detectIpfsPathHeader_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_detectIpfsPathHeader_description)
option_detectIpfsPathHeader_description.message: Load items with x-ipfs-path headers over IPFS (instead of HTTP) if the header value is an IPFS path. To redirect IPNS paths as well, enable DNSLink support.

option_detectIpfsPathHeader_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_detectIpfsPathHeader_title)

option_displayNotifications_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_displayNotifications_description)
option_displayNotifications_description.message: Display OS-level notifications when a link is copied to the clipboard,the API state changes, etc.

option_displayNotifications_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_displayNotifications_title)

option_dnslinkDataPreload_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_dnslinkDataPreload_description)
option_dnslinkDataPreload_description.message: Preload DNSLink sites to your local IPFS node, enabling offline access and improving your resiliency against network failure.

option_dnslinkDataPreload_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_dnslinkDataPreload_title)

option_dnslinkPolicy_bestEffort.description: A select field option description on the Preferences screen (option_dnslinkPolicy_bestEffort)

option_dnslinkRedirect_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_dnslinkRedirect_description)
option_dnslinkRedirect_description.message: When global gateway redirect is enabled, include DNSLink websites by redirecting them to their respective /ipns/{fqdn} paths at your custom gateway.

option_dnslinkRedirect_title.message: Load DNSLink Sites from Custom Gateway

option_dnslinkRedirect_warning.description: A warning on the Preferences screen, displayed when URL does not belong to Secure Context (option_customGatewayUrl_warning)
option_dnslinkRedirect_warning.message: Do not use if your IPFS node does not support *.ipfs.localhost. Redirecting to a path-based gateway breaks the origin-based security isolation of DNSLink websites, so make sure you understand the related risks.

option_recoverFailedHttpRequests_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_recoverFailedHttpRequests_title)

option_resetAllOptions_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_resetAllOptions_description)
option_resetAllOptions_description.message: Reset all IPFS Companion preferences to their default values (warning: cannot be undone!).

option_useCustomGateway_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_useCustomGateway_description)
option_useCustomGateway_description.message: Redirect requests for IPFS resources to your custom local gateway.

option_useCustomGateway_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_useCustomGateway_title)

option_useLatestWebUI_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_useLatestWebUI_description)
option_useLatestWebUI_description.message: Use the very latest version of the Status, Files, Explore, Peers, and Settings screens from webui.ipfs.io (via DNSLink) instead of the hard-coded CIDs shipped with the IPFS daemon. (Enable only if you trust your DNS resolver and understand how to set up the required CORS headers.)

option_useLatestWebUI_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_useLatestWebUI_title)
option_useLatestWebUI_title.message: Use Latest Version of IPFS Web UI

option_useSubdomains_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen (option_useSubdomains_description)
option_useSubdomains_description.message: Isolate content roots from each other by loading them as subdomains (at *.localhost) and creating a unique origin for each CID, IPNS, or DNSLink record. Requires go-ipfs 0.5.0 or later on your local node.

option_useSubdomains_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen (option_useSubdomains_title)
